features.title: Three Houses, One Community
features.description: The Fellowship spans three houses on a half-acre property, creating a village-like atmosphere with private spaces and shared amenities.

features.title: Private Gym

features.title: Cold Plunge & Hot Tub
features.description: Recover and relax with our cold plunge and hot tub. Perfect for post-workout recovery or unwinding after a long day.

features.title: Home Movie Theatre
features.description: Enjoy movie nights in our dedicated theatre room with comfortable seating and a big screen. Host watch parties or catch up on your favorites.

features.title: House Tesla
features.description: Need to run errands or explore Austin? The community Tesla is available for residents to use, making car-free living easy.

features.title: Backyard Chickens
features.description: Fresh eggs from our backyard flock. Connect with nature and enjoy farm-fresh breakfast without leaving home.

features.title: Half-Acre Outdoor Space
features.description: Spread out across a half-acre of outdoor space. Gardens, gathering areas, and room to breathe in the heart of Travis Heights.

features.title: Steps from Lady Bird Trail
features.description: Less than a mile to the Lady Bird Lake Trail. Morning runs, evening walks, and kayaking all within easy reach.

features.title: Flexible Month-to-Month Leases
features.description: No long-term commitments required. Month-to-month leases give you the flexibility to stay as long as you need.

features.title: Blazing Fast Internet
features.description: Business-grade 1 Gbps symmetric fiber throughout all three houses. Work remotely without interruption.

features.title: Fully Equipped Kitchens
features.description: Each house has a fully stocked kitchen. Cook your own meals or join community dinners with fellow residents.

features.title: Safety & Security
features.description: Exterior cameras, fenced property, and smart locks on each bedroom. Peace of mind in a welcoming community.
